Key: Wait... that cat...

Every time I pass by, you always come up to me,
don't ya? So... how've you been?
Translation: Cada vez que paso, siempre te me acercas, ¿no? Así que... ¿cómo has estado?

Key:
You're so friendly. Are you really a stray? I wonder
if your owner just lets you roam around.
Translation: Eres tan amigable. ¿De verdad eres un perro callejero? Me pregunto si tu dueño te deja vagar por ahí.

Key: Oh, you're going already? See ya!
Hm?
Kurumi?
You have a way with cats, don't you?
Translation: Se te dan bien los gatos, ¿verdad?

Key: You always show up when I least expect it...
Translation: Siempre apareces cuando menos lo espero...

Key:
Maybe the animals can tell that you're
a good person, Shido-san.
Translation: Puede que los animales se den cuenta de que eres una buena persona, Shido-san.

Key: I wonder. Who knows, really?

Animals can instinctively read their opponents.
I'm sure this cat doesn't feel the need to get its
guard up around you.
Translation: Los animales pueden leer instintivamente a sus oponentes.  Seguro que este gato no siente la necesidad de ponerse en guardia cerca de ti.

Key:
Some humans are scheming and terrible...
but I'm sure it doesn't look at you that way.
Translation: Algunos humanos son intrigantes y terribles... pero seguro que a ti no te mira así.

Key: Y-You really think so?
Yes. I feel the same.
Huh?

I know you wouldn't do anything evil towards me.
There's a part of me that finds it easy to appear
before you like this.
Translation: Sé que no harías nada malo contra mí.  Hay una parte de mí a la que le resulta fácil presentarse así ante ti.

Key:
Hehe. I mean, there aren't a lot of people out there
who would so casually talk to somebody who attempted
to murder them.
Translation: Jeje. Quiero decir, no hay mucha gente ahí fuera que hablaría tan despreocupadamente con alguien que intentó asesinarle.

Key: About that...
So, Shido-san. What... do you think of me?
(Kurumi, huh? What do I think of her...?)
I'd be lying if I said I'm not afraid of you.
Translation: Mentiría si dijera que no te tengo miedo.

Key: I'm not scared of you.

W-Well... I'd be lying if I said I'm not afraid of you.
Honestly, I have no idea what you're going to
try and do to me.
Translation: Bueno... Mentiría si dijera que no te tengo miedo.  Sinceramente, no tengo ni idea de lo que vas a intentar hacerme.

Key:
But I don't hate you. I still want to save you.
That much hasn't changed.
Translation: Pero no te odio. Sigo queriendo salvarte.  Eso no ha cambiado.

Key: After all that's happened, you sure are optimistic.
Translation: Después de todo lo que ha pasado, seguro que eres optimista.

Key: It's because I don't believe you're evil deep down.
Translation: Es porque no creo que seas malvado en el fondo.

Key: Shido, you're so naïve.
You think so?

Yes. Absolutely. But I also find part of you to be
comforting, and I think that is something both
humans and animals can sense.
Translation: Sí. Por supuesto. Pero también encuentro que parte de ti es reconfortante, y creo que eso es algo que tanto los humanos como los animales pueden sentir.

Key: Kurumi...
Well, Shido-san, I'll see you around.
She's like a ghost.

I don't find you scary... for now, anyway.
You are just like an ordinary girl, Kurumi.
Translation: No me das miedo... por ahora, al menos.  Eres como una chica normal, Kurumi.

Key:
I want to talk to you normally, and if there's
ever a problem, I want to help you.
Translation: Quiero hablar contigo normalmente, y si alguna vez hay un problema, quiero ayudarte.

Key: You still don't get it, do you, Shido-san?
What do you mean?

You can label me like that, but I definitely
won't meet your expectations.
Translation: Puedes etiquetarme así, pero seguro que no cumpliré tus expectativas.

Key: Kurumi...

Our sense of justice and equality is different.
We will never see eye to eye.
Translation: Nuestro sentido de la justicia y la igualdad es diferente.  Nunca estaremos de acuerdo.

Key: Oh...
And yet, you are so honest. It really is interesting.
Translation: Y sin embargo, eres tan honesto. Es realmente interesante.

Key:
Well, good day, Shido-san. I pray that your
kindness won't be your downfall.
Translation: Bueno, buen día, Shido-san. Rezo para que tu amabilidad no sea tu perdición.

Key: Kurumi...
